inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of hepatic cirrhosis based on biopsy, clinical and/or radiological findings.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Stable HE (chronic): On daily lactulose for more than 6 months without hospitalization
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Treated with lactulose on a daily basis, with restoration of mental status to baseline.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Lives with an adult individual who is willing to serve as a full-time caregiver.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able and willing to give informed consent.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Pre-existing focal neurological deficits, seizures or other indication of structural neurological disorder.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Actively abusing illicit drugs or alcohol.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has CLL and large cell transformation. He presented with his disease back in [**10/2119**] with an elevated white count and LDH.
